current_scene.name: Neon Alley Ambush
current_scene.description: The humid night air hangs thick with the smell of fried noodles and cheap synth-booze as you navigate the narrow, neon-drenched alley. Gutters overflow with a viscous, luminescent sludge. Above, holographic advertisements flicker, casting distorted shadows that dance across the grimy walls. The air crackles with the hum of illicit power lines and the distant throb of a rave. You're here to meet Pollux's contact, 'Whisper,' but something feels off. A sudden metallic *clink* echoes from the darkness ahead, followed by the unmistakable whir of charging energy weapons.

characters.name: Kage (Ambush Leader)
characters.description: A hulking figure clad in patched-together body armor, his face obscured by a cracked cybernetic mask. He wields a heavy energy rifle with a menacing grin visible even through the damage to his mask.

characters.name: Razor (Street Thug)
characters.description: A wiry thug with a mohawk dyed an unnatural shade of green, sporting various chrome implants and wielding a rusty pipe.

characters.name: Zero (Hacker)
characters.description: Hunched over a data slate, Zero wears baggy, dark clothes, with cables leading from the device to ports in their temples. Distracted and looking panicked, he is clearly the brains of this operation.

objects.name: Overturned Dumpster
objects.description: A large, metal dumpster tipped on its side, providing limited cover.

objects.name: Graffiti-Covered Wall
objects.description: A wall covered in layers of colorful graffiti, depicting gang symbols and anti-corporate slogans.

objects.name: Illicit Power Line
objects.description: A thick, frayed cable running along the alley wall, sparking intermittently.

threats.name: Yakuza Ambush
threats.description: Kage and his crew are lying in wait, eager to deliver a painful message. The combination of brute force and hacking capability is dangerous.

suggested_actions: Use Cyber Eyes to identify targets.
Attempt a silent takedown on one of the attackers.
Disrupt the power line to create a distraction.

quest_data.name: Data Extraction: The Pollux Debt
quest_data.description: Pollux needs your help again. He's tasked you with extracting sensitive data from a heavily guarded Arasaka facility downtown. The data is crucial for his operations, and he's promised to shave a significant portion off your debt if you succeed. However, Arasaka security is notoriously tight, and the facility is crawling with corporate security and cybernetically enhanced guards. Failure is not an option, not if you value your continued existence.

client.name: Pollux
client.description: A shadowy fixer with deep connections in the criminal underworld. He saved your life once, and now you owe him a debt you're struggling to repay.

objectives.description: Extract the data without triggering a full lockdown.
Deliver the data to Pollux's contact.

locations.name: Arasaka Data Center (Downtown)
locations.description: A heavily fortified corporate facility in the heart of the city, bristling with security measures.

locations.name: The Faraday Cage (Pollux's Contact)
locations.description: A discreet rendezvous point in the Combat Zone. Pollux's associate will be waiting to receive the datachip.

npcs.name: Chief Security Officer (CSO) Nakamura
npcs.description: The head of security at the Arasaka facility, known for his ruthlessness and efficiency.

npcs.name: Glitch (Hacker Contact)
npcs.description: A skilled Netrunner who can provide support with bypassing security systems, but they demand a cut.

npcs.name: Rook (Pollux's contact)
npcs.description: A silent, enigmatic figure who operates in the shadows. He is Pollux's designated recipient for the stolen data.
